entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and local blowing snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
